thread.title: WH Denies Mass Deportation Is Goal Of Guidelines Targeting Those In US Illegally
thread.title_full: WH Denies Mass Deportation Is Goal Of Guidelines Targeting Those In US Illegally

author: Esme Cribb
title: WH Denies Mass Deportation Is Goal Of Guidelines Targeting Those In US Illegally
text:
White House press secretary Sean Spicer denied on Tuesday that mass deportation is one of the goals of new guidelines from President Donald Trump's administration targeting immigrants who are living in the United States illegally.
Read More â†’
